confirmRegistration.title: Confirm registration

confirmRegistration.messageFailure: Sorry, your account could not be confirmed!

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.first: We use cookies in order to keep you logged in, otherwise you would need to type your password on each request.
cookiePolicy.second: Of course it doesn't mean that we store your credentials. Only the JWT (token) is stored within the app and it's not possible to extract credentials from it.
cookiePolicy.third: We also keep confirm-cookie-consent cookies, to make sure that the cookie consent will not show up again after accepting the policy.
cookiePolicy.fourth: Service worker related cookies are also kept, as the application is a Progressive Web App (PWA).
cookiePolicy.theEnd: The end of cookie policy. I'm glad that you spent your time reading it. Enjoy using the app!
cookiePolicy.cookiebotTested: App has been tested by Cookiebot which proved to be compliant with the requirements of General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the ePrivacy Directive 2009/136/EC (ePR).

cookie.message: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.
